name: pinto
content:
pinto noun
(BEAN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural ] a pinto bean (= a bean with small, brown marks on it, used in cooking), or a plant on which these beans grow: I used black beans, kidney beans, and pintos. Pintos grow well in summer, but green beans need cooler weather.

pinto noun
(HORSE)
[ C ] US a horse that has a pattern of two different colours of hair, usually brown and white or black and white: There was a painting of a cowboy on a black and white pinto. The younger mustangs, especially the distinctive pintos and grays, are sold at auction. Compare
piebald
skewbald

Descriptions of animal (non-human) markings
(of a horse) having a pattern of two different colours of hair, usually black and white or brown and white: A figure astride a pinto pony approached us. The foal was the offspring of a Percheron stallion and a pinto mare. Compare
piebald
skewbald
